thread.title: Tricension Thrilled to Continue Sponsorship and Involvement with LAUGHH Foundation
thread.title_full: Tricension Thrilled to Continue Sponsorship and Involvement with LAUGHH Foundation

author: Mike Lammers
title: Tricension Thrilled to Continue Sponsorship and Involvement with LAUGHH Foundation
text:
Tricension’s culture of community involvement continues to support the LAUGHH (Live Abundantly Using Guided Helping Hands) Foundation through sponsorship of the 2nd Annual Learning to LAUGHH Celebration. The annual event includes a silent auction, BBQ, and a presentation on the July 2015 Mission Trip to Colombia. This year’s event will be held at Cerner’s Riverport Facility on September 19, 2015. More information about the event details, including ticket purchasing, can be found at LAUGHH.org. The LAUGHH Foundation fundraiser silent auction begins at 5:00 p.m. and will be followed by dinner, dessert and a presentation on the 2015 Mission Trip to Colombia. Food for the evening is provided by award winning All Sizes BBQ. The event is limited to 200 guests and tickets can be purchased at LAUGHH.org.
Most recent mission:
The LAUGHH Foundation team flew to Bucaramanga, Colombia in July of this year to offer health and wellness care and education in the towns of La Fortuna, Girón, Berlín and Piedecuesta. Led by Gisella Alvarez and Dr. Bruce Sands, the 40-member team offered primary medical care including general medicine, pediatrics, gynecology, wound care, physical therapy, occupational therapy, nursing and an incredibly successful education process to over 1,400 patients. They gave 10 wheelchairs, 15 walkers and 30 canes. Our first partnership with a medical school brought 6 3rd year medical students onto the team and they acted as translators for the physicians and part of the education team. We hope to have a Skype session with them during the program so everyone can hear their amazing message about the mission. The entire mission team saw lives changed and miracles every day! You will experience more of those during the program! It will be great!
Previous Missions and Community Service:
July 2014:
Medical and Wellness Mission in Bucaramanga, Colombia.
April 2013:
Roof Rafters for a HABITAT FOR HUMANITY house in Tampa, FL.
July 2012:
House repairs and painting for a needy family in Kansas City, MO.
July 2011:
Medical and surgical supplies at PARTNERS FOR WORLD HEALTH in Portland, ME.
June 2010:
Cleared a vacant lot for the use of a Community Garden in Fort Lauderdale, FL.
About the LAUGHH Foundation:
The purpose of the LAUGHH Foundation is to serve those who are underserved through medical missions, support of educational ministries, and community service. A major component of these is to go beyond traditional medical treatment. Our mission includes providing tools that enable and empower people to change their lives. We not only treat conditions, but educate on how to control and prevent chronic conditions. This includes exercise and nutrition education through workshops that help people understand how they can improve their lives, so that the quality of their life continues to improve after we leave.
For more information visit: http://www.LAUGHH.org
About Tricension:
Tricension is a business advisory and technology solutions firm whose founders are accomplished business and technology executives with an excellent track record in solving complex challenges. The Kansas City, MO based company has been listed as one of the “Fastest Growing Companies” by the Kansas City Business Journal and Ingram’s Magazine for three consecutive years. Tricension was also named to the 25 Under 25 Class of 2014, given out each year to 25 companies in the Kansas City area who have excelled in community involvement, ability to recognize and overcome business challenges, and growth.
The founders of Tricension have over 50 years of combined solutions design and development experience in large enterprises in Healthcare, Financial Services, Insurance, Government, Manufacturing and others. Since founding Tricension in early 2008, the team has delivered over 80 software design and development solutions.
Visit http://www.Tricension.com for more information.
